characters: Driver of a black SUV, driver of a white sedan, driver of a red car
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a multi-lane road during sunset. The traffic is moderate, with several vehicles visible ahead. The black SUV on the left side is moving steadily, while the white sedan and red car are on the right side, maintaining their lanes.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a consistent speed and lane position. The vehicle is observing the traffic ahead, ensuring a safe distance from the vehicles in front. No sudden changes in speed or direction are observed.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A black SUV, approximately 10 meters away, moving steadily. 2) Right side: A white sedan, approximately 15 meters away, maintaining its lane. 3) Right side: A red car, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining its lane.
